comments: According to Ilg, W.: Die Regensburgische Botanische Gesellschaft - Hoppea 42: 34 (1984)  the second forename is 'Baptist' rather than 'Baptista' as in Barnhart.
examples: Centaurea zimmermannian Zinsmeister in Mitt. Bayer. Bot. Ges. ii. 282 (1916);  cf. Fedde, Repert., 14: 378.
source: IK db. Barnhart, J.H., Biogr. Notes upon Botanists. Dorfler, I., Botaniker  Adressbuch, ed. 3: 78 (1909). Year of death from Mitt. Bot. Staatsammlung Munchen, 26: 424 (1988). Year of birth from Dr. Fritz Hiemeyer via S. Dressler 26.5.2000.
